anya-e0803n4:8_0: Tadevaṁ nāmikaṁ ñe yyaṁ, saliṅgaṁ savibhattikaṁ.
anya-e0803n4:11_0: Paṭhamā dutiyā tatiyā, catutthī pañcamī tathā;
anya-e0803n4:12_0: Chaṭṭhī ca sattamī cāti, honti satta vibhattiyo.
anya-e0803n4:13_0: Liṅgatthe paṭhamā sāyaṁ, bhinnā dvedhā siyo iti;
anya-e0803n4:14_0: Kammatthe dutiyā sāpi, bhinnā aṁ yo iti dvidhā.
anya-e0803n4:15_0: Karaṇe tatiyā sāpi, bhinnā nā hi iti dvidhā;
anya-e0803n4:16_0: Sampadāne catutthī sā, bhinnā dvedhā sa naṁ iti.
anya-e0803n4:17_0: Apādāne pañcamī sā, bhinnā dvedhā smā hi iti;
anya-e0803n4:18_0: Chaṭṭhī sāmimhi sā cāpi, bhinnā dvedhā sa naṁ iti.
anya-e0803n4:19_0: Okāse sattamī sāpi, bhinnā dvedhā smiṁsu iti;
anya-e0803n4:23_0: Yo karotisa kattātu, taṁ kammaṁ yaṁ karoti vā;
anya-e0803n4:24_0: Kubbate yena vā tantu, karaṇaṁ iti saññitaṁ.
anya-e0803n4:25_0: Deti rocati vā yassa, sampadānanti taṁ mataṁ;
anya-e0803n4:26_0: Yatopeti bhayaṁ vā taṁ, apādānanti kittitaṁ.
anya-e0803n4:27_0: Yassāyatto samūhovā, taṁ ve sāmīti desitaṁ;
anya-e0803n4:31_0: Vinā ālapanatthaṁ liṅgatthādīsu paṭhamādivibhattuppatti upalakkhaṇavasena vuttāti daṭṭhabbaṁ.
anya-e0803n4:35_0: Tatra paccattavacanaṁ nāma tividhaliṅgavavatthānagatānaṁ itthipumanapuṁsakānaṁ paccattasabhāvaniddesattho.
anya-e0803n4:36_0: Bhūto, bhāvako, bhavo, abhavo, bhāvo, abhāvo, sabhāvo, sabbhāvo, sambhavo, pabhavo, pabhāvo, anubhavo, ānubhāvo,
anya-e0803n4:37_0: Abhibhavitā, paribhavitā, anubhavitā, samanubhavitā, bhāvitā, paccanubhavitāti ākārantapulliṅgaṁ.
anya-e0803n4:41_0: Sayambhū, pabhū, abhibhū, vibhū, adhibhū, patibhū, gotrabhū, vatrabhū,
anya-e0803n4:43_5: Ettha sattoti atthavācako bhūtasaddoyeva niyogā pulliṅgantipi daṭṭhabbo.
anya-e0803n4:44_2: yaṁ dhammajātaṁ bhūta’’nti evaṁ liṅgattaye yojanārahattā aniyataliṅgā aññepi bhūtaparābhūtasambhūtasaddādayo sandissanti pāvacanavare,
anya-e0803n4:44_3: tepi nānopasagganipātapadehi yojanavasena saddaracanāyaṁ sukhumatthaggahaṇe ca viññūnaṁ kosallajananatthaṁ niyatapulliṅgesu pakkhipitvā dassessāma.
anya-e0803n4:46_0: Bhāvikā, bhāvanā, vibhāvanā, sambhāvanā, paribhāvanāti ākārantaitthiliṅgaṁ.
anya-e0803n4:51_4: okārantassa vā gosaddassa itthiliṅgabhāve tena saddhiṁ chabbidhānipi honti,
anya-e0803n4:52_2: sambhūtāti sabbaṁ vitthārato gahetabbaṁ ‘‘anubhonto samanubhonto’’tiādīni nava padāni vajjetvā.
anya-e0803n4:52_5: Evaṁ ākārantādivasena catubbidhāni itthiliṅgāni bhūdhātumayāni pakāsitāni.
anya-e0803n4:56_1: Ettha sattabhūtarūpavācako bhūtasaddoyeva niyogā napuṁsakaliṅgotipi daṭṭhabbaṁ.
anya-e0803n4:56_2: Etthāpi aniyataliṅgā bhūta parābhūta sambhūtasaddādayo napuṁsakaliṅgavasena yujjante.
anya-e0803n4:57_31: Evaṁ niggahītantādivasena tividhāni napuṁsakaliṅgāni bhūdhātumayāni pakāsitāni .
anya-e0803n4:58_0: Ettha me appasiddhāti, ye ye saddā pakāsitā;
anya-e0803n4:60_0: O, ā, bindu, i, ī, u, ū-antime sattadhā ṭhitā;
anya-e0803n4:62_0: Ā ivaṇṇo cuvaṇṇo ca, pañca antā sarūpato;
anya-e0803n4:64_0: Bindu, i, u-ime antā, tayo ñeyyā vibhāvinā;
anya-e0803n4:66_0: Antā satteva pulliṅge, itthiyaṁ pañca vā cha vā;
anya-e0803n4:67_0: Napuṁsake tayo evaṁ, dasa pañcahi chabbidhā.
anya-e0803n4:68_0: Yasmā panettha ‘‘bhūto’’tiādayo saddā nibbacanābhidheyyakathanatthasādhakavacanapariyāyavacanatthuddhāravasena vuccamānā pākaṭā honti suviññeyyā ca,
anya-e0803n4:68_1: tasmā imesaṁ nibbacanādīni yathāsambhavaṁ vakkhāma viññūnaṁ tuṭṭhijananatthañceva sotārānamatthesu paṭutarabuddhipaṭilābhāya ca.
anya-e0803n4:68_8: bhūtā loke samussaya’’nti ca idametassa atthassa sādhakavacanaṁ.
anya-e0803n4:68_9: Atha vā bhūtoti evaṁnāmako amanussajātiyo sattaviseso,
anya-e0803n4:68_14: Yañca pana ‘‘satto macco pajā’’tiādikaṁ tattha tattha āgataṁ vacanaṁ,
anya-e0803n4:68_16: Yañca niddesapāḷiyaṁ ‘‘maccoti satto naro mānavo poso puggalo jīvo jagu jantu hindagu manujo’’ti āgataṁ,
anya-e0803n4:69_0: Satto macco jano bhūto, pāṇo hindagu puggalo;
anya-e0803n4:70_0: Jantu jīvo jagu yakkho, pāṇī dehī tathāgato.
anya-e0803n4:71_0: Sattavo mātiyo loko, manujo mānavo naro;
anya-e0803n4:73_0: Pajāti itthiyaṁ vutto, liṅgato, na ca atthato;
anya-e0803n4:75_0: Yo so jaṅghāya ulati, so satto jaṅghalo idha;
anya-e0803n4:77_0: Imasmiṁ pakaraṇe ‘‘pariyāyavacana’’nti ca ‘‘abhidhāna’’nti ca ‘‘saṅkhā’’tiādīni ca ekatthāni adhippetāni,
anya-e0803n4:77_10: Imāni ‘‘bhūto bhāvako’’ti dve padāni suddhakattuhetukattuvasena vuttānīti.
anya-e0803n4:77_11: Ito paraṁ nayānusārena suviññeyyattā ‘‘idaṁ nibbacana’’nti ca ādīni avatvā katthaci atthasādhakavacanaṁ
anya-e0803n4:77_13: Tesu hi sabbattha dassitesu ganthavitthāro siyā,
anya-e0803n4:78_2: Bhūsaddassa atthātisayayogato vaḍḍhanepi dissamānattā bhavanaṁ vaḍḍhananti katvā.
anya-e0803n4:78_3: ‘‘Bhavo ca rañño abhavo ca rañño’’ti idaṁ vuddhiatthassa sādhakaṁ vacanaṁ.
anya-e0803n4:78_5: ‘‘Sassato attā ca loko cā’’ti hi sassatavasena pavattā diṭṭhi sassatadiṭṭhi,
anya-e0803n4:78_8: bhavati sassataṁ tiṭṭhatīti pavattanato sassatadiṭṭhi bhavadiṭṭhi nāma.
anya-e0803n4:78_12: ekacce samaṇā vā brāhmaṇā vā bhavadiṭṭhiyā vā kāmabhavādinā vā sabbabhavato vimuttiṁ saṁsāravisuddhiṁ kathayiṁsūti.
anya-e0803n4:78_13: Atha vā bhavanti vaḍḍhanti sattā etenāti bhavoti atthena sampattipuññāni bhavoti ca vuccanti.
anya-e0803n4:79_3: so sarūpaṁ labhatī’’ti katvā ‘‘bhavati avijjātaṇhādisamudayā nirantaraṁ samudetī’’ti atthena vā ‘‘bhavā’’ti vuccanti.
anya-e0803n4:79_4: Okāso pana ‘‘bhavanti jāyanti ettha sattā nāmarūpadhammā cā’’ti atthena ‘‘bhavo’’ti.
anya-e0803n4:79_12: kammaṁ pana yathā sukhakāraṇattā ‘‘sukho buddhānamuppādo’’ti vutto.
anya-e0803n4:79_19: Atha vā ‘‘bhavapaccayā jātī’’ti vacanato bhavati etenāti bhavoti kammabhavo vuccati.
anya-e0803n4:82_4: Bhavati ettha sattasammuti khandhādipaṭipāṭisaṅkhāte dhammapuñjasminti atthena .
anya-e0803n4:93_5: Hadayaṅgatabhāvaṁ pakāsetī’’ti evamādi etassatthassa sādhakaṁ vacanaṁ.
anya-e0803n4:93_10: bhāve ca te kusalaṁ natthi kiñcī’’ti idametassatthassa sādhakaṁ vacanaṁ.
anya-e0803n4:93_15: Tattha ajjhāsayo ca vatthudhammo ca cittañca satto cāti ime bhavatīti bhāvo.
anya-e0803n4:93_20: yaṁ itthibhāvo pumbhāvo itthindriyanti ca vuccati.
anya-e0803n4:93_22: ‘‘itthī’’ti vā ‘‘puriso’’ti vā bhavati etena cittaṁ abhidhānañcāti bhāvo.
anya-e0803n4:96_1: itthīti vā bhavati etena cittaṁ abhidhānañcāti itthibhāvo’’ti,
anya-e0803n4:96_2: tasmā pumbhāvoti etthāpi pumassa bhāvo pumbhāvo,
anya-e0803n4:96_3: pumāti vā bhavati etena cittaṁ abhidhānañcāti pumbhāvoti nibbacanaṁ samadhigantabbaṁ.
anya-e0803n4:97_0: Abhāvoti na bhāvoti abhāvo, ko so?
anya-e0803n4:97_4: Atha vā sabhāvoti dhammānaṁ sati atthasambhave yo koci sarūpaṁ labhati,
anya-e0803n4:97_5: tassa bhāvo lakkhaṇamiti saññito namanaruppanakakkhaḷaphusanādiākāro iccevattho.
anya-e0803n4:97_7: dhammānaṁ lakkhaṇaṁ mata’’nti idametassatthassa sādhakaṁ vacanaṁ.
anya-e0803n4:98_2: Yutti hi sambhavoti vuccati ‘‘sambhavo gahaṇassa kāraṇa’’ntiādīsu.
anya-e0803n4:98_11: Ime pana sambhavapabhavasaddā katthaci samānatthā katthaci bhinnatthāti veditabbā. Kathaṁ?
anya-e0803n4:98_12: Sambhavasaddo hi bhavanakriyampi vadati yuttimpi paññattimpi sambhavarūpampi paccayatthampi,
anya-e0803n4:98_13: pabhavasaddo pana bhavanakriyampi vadati nadippabhavampi paccayatthampi,
anya-e0803n4:98_16: Vuttañhetaṁ ‘‘paccayo hetu nidānaṁ kāraṇaṁ sambhavo pabhavotiādi atthato ekaṁ,
anya-e0803n4:102_2: taṁ pana uttari āvibhavissati ‘‘dhanamassa bhavatūti dhanabhūtī’’tiādinā.
anya-e0803n4:102_3: Iccevaṁ kitakavasena sabbathāpi sattavidhāni sādhanāni honti,
anya-e0803n4:102_6: Idha payogesvatthesu ca viññūnaṁ pāṭavatthaṁ sādhananāmaṁ pakāsitaṁ.
anya-e0803n4:102_7: Tathā hi dunnikkhittasādhanehi padehi yojitā saddappayogā dubbodhatthā honti,
anya-e0803n4:102_8: sunikkhittasādhanehi pana padehi yojitā subodhatthā honti,
anya-e0803n4:102_11: Payogānurūpañhi aviparītaṁ katvā atthaṁ kathanasīlā ‘‘yācitova bahulaṁ cīvaraṁ paribhuñjati,
anya-e0803n4:102_12: appaṁ ayācito’’ti evamādīsu sādhanavasena gahetabbesu atthesu,
anya-e0803n4:102_13: aññesu catthesu paṭutarabuddhino paṇḍitāyeva ekantena bhagavato pariyattisāsanadharā nāma hontīti veditabbaṁ.
anya-e0803n4:102_14: Ito paraṁ nayānusārena suviññeyyattā ‘‘idaṁ nāma sādhana’’nti na vakkhāma,
anya-e0803n4:102_15: kevalamidha dassitesu payogesu viññūnaṁ bahumānuppādanatthañceva vividhavicittapāḷigatike vividhatthasāre
anya-e0803n4:102_16: jinavaravacane sotūnaṁ buddhivijambhanatthañca atthasādhakavacanāniyeva yathārahaṁ suttageyyaveyyākaraṇagāthādīsu
anya-e0803n4:103_3: yena tvaṁ mithilaṁ vaje’’ti idametassatthassa sādhakaṁ vacanaṁ.
anya-e0803n4:103_7: ‘‘Tejasaṅkhato ussāhamantapabhūsattisaṅkhāto vā mahanto ānubhāvo etassāti mahānubhāvo’’ti idametassatthassa sādhakaṁ vacanaṁ.
anya-e0803n4:105_0: Ānubhāvāti vuccanti, pabhāvāti ca te vade.
anya-e0803n4:108_1: ‘‘Anubhavitabbassa phalassa mahantatāya mahānubhāvo’’ti idametassatthassa sādhakaṁ vacanaṁ.
anya-e0803n4:108_5: Apica ‘‘dhammadessī parābhavo’’ti pāṭhānurūpato parābhavissatīti parābhavoti anāgatakālavasenapi nibbacanaṁ daṭṭhabbaṁ.
anya-e0803n4:108_6: Atha vā parābhavanti etenāti parābhavo. Kiṁ taṁ?
anya-e0803n4:108_10: Tañhi bhavato vigatattā bhavato vigatoti vibhavo,
anya-e0803n4:108_11: bhavassa ca taṁhetu vigatattā vigato bhavo etasmāti vibhavo.
anya-e0803n4:108_12: Vibhavanti ucchijjanti vinassanti ito ariyadhanavilomakā kilesamahācorātipi vibhavo.
anya-e0803n4:109_0: Nibbānaṁ vibhavo mokkho, nirodho amataṁ samaṁ;
anya-e0803n4:118_0: Santi asaṅkhatā dhātu, disā ca sabbatopabhaṁ.
anya-e0803n4:131_1: Tattha vināso vibhavanaṁ ucchijjanaṁ nassananti atthena vibhavo.
anya-e0803n4:131_3: ittheke sato sattassa ucchedaṁ vināsaṁ vibhavaṁ paññapentī’’ti ca idametassatthassa sādhakaṁ vacanaṁ.
anya-e0803n4:131_6: Dhanaṁ pana bhavanti vaḍḍhanti vuddhiṁ virūḷhiṁ vepullaṁ āpajjanti sattā etenāti vibhavo.
anya-e0803n4:131_7: ‘‘Asītikoṭivibhavassa brāhmaṇassa putto hutvā nibbattī’’ti idametassatthassa sādhakaṁ vacanaṁ.
anya-e0803n4:132_0: Dhanaṁ saṁ vibhavo dabbaṁ, sāpateyyaṁ pariggaho;
anya-e0803n4:133_0: Oḍḍaṁ bhaṇḍaṁ sakaṁ attho, iccete dhanavācakā.
anya-e0803n4:134_0: Ucchedadiṭṭhi pana vibhavati ucchijjati ‘‘attā ca loko ca puna cutito uddhaṁ na jāyatī’’ti gahaṇato vibhavoti.
anya-e0803n4:137_10: Natthibhāvoti natthitā avijjamānatā vivittatā rittatā tucchatā suññatā.
anya-e0803n4:138_4: sukhaṁ vā dukkhaṁ vā adukkhamasukhaṁ vā anubhavanto yo koci.
anya-e0803n4:138_8: Anuppannassa maggassa uppādetā’’tiādīsu ‘‘dātā’’ti padānaṁ kattuvācakānaṁ ‘‘amatassā’’tiādīhi padehi
anya-e0803n4:138_10: tathā imesampi padānaṁ ‘‘paccāmittassa abhibhavitā’’tiādinā yojanā kātabbā.
anya-e0803n4:139_13: Ettha pana dhātuatthe ādaro na kātabbo,
anya-e0803n4:141_0: Sohaṁ appabhavaṁ tattha, sākhaṁ hatthehi aggahi’’nti
anya-e0803n4:144_5: Tatra vibhāvīti atthavibhāvane samattho paṇḍito vuccati.
anya-e0803n4:145_0: Vidvā vijjāgato ñāṇī, vibhāvī paṇḍito sudhī;
anya-e0803n4:146_0: Budho visārado viññū, dosaññū viddasu vidū.
anya-e0803n4:147_0: Vipassī paṭibhāṇī ca, medhāvī nipako kavi;
anya-e0803n4:148_0: Kusalo viduro dhīmā, gatimā mutimā cayaṁ.
anya-e0803n4:149_0: Cakkhumā kaṇṇavā dabbo, dhīro bhūri vicakkhaṇo;
anya-e0803n4:152_0: Sayambhūti sayameva bhavatīti sayambhū. Ko so?
anya-e0803n4:152_1: Antarena paropadesaṁ sāmaṁyeva sabbaṁ ñeyyadhammaṁ paṭivijjhitvā sabbaññutaṁ patto sakyamuni bhagavā.
anya-e0803n4:153_0: ‘‘Na me ācariyo atthi, sadiso me na vijjati;
anya-e0803n4:155_0: Ahañhi arahā loke, ahaṁ satthā anuttaro;
anya-e0803n4:157_0: Atthato pana pāramitāparibhāvito sayambhūñāṇena saha vāsanāya vigataviddhastaniravasesakileso mahākaruṇāsabbaññutaññāṇādiaparimeyyaguṇagaṇādhāro
anya-e0803n4:157_2: So evaṁbhūto khandhasantāno loke aggapuggaloti vuccati.
anya-e0803n4:157_3: Vuttañhetaṁ bhagavatā ‘‘ekapuggalo bhikkhave loke uppajjamāno uppajjati acchariyamanusso,
anya-e0803n4:157_9: sakyaputto sakko sakyamuni sakyasīho sakyapuṅgavoti kulato ca pasiddho,
anya-e0803n4:158_0: Yo ekapuggalo āsi, buddho so vadataṁ varo;
anya-e0803n4:161_0: Sakko iti ca avhito, tathā sakyamunīti ca.
anya-e0803n4:186_0: Sammāsambuddho iti so, ñāto sattuttamoti ca;
anya-e0803n4:193_0: Nāmaṁ guṇehi nissitaṁ, ko kavindo kathessati.
anya-e0803n4:204_0: Tathā hi satthavāho naravaro chaḷabhiññoti evaṁpakārāni abhidhānapadāni visesakapadāpekkhakāni. Kathaṁ?
anya-e0803n4:211_1: Buddho jino bhagavāti evaṁpakārāni pana no visesakāpekkhānīti daṭṭhabbaṁ.
anya-e0803n4:212_0: Keci panettha evaṁ vadeyyuṁ ‘‘munindo samaṇindo samaṇissaro yatissaro ādiccabandhu ravibandhūti evaṁpakārānaṁ
anya-e0803n4:212_1: idha vuttānamabhidhānānaṁ visesatthābhāvato punaruttidoso atthī’’ti. Tanna,
anya-e0803n4:212_2: abhidhānānaṁ abhisaṅkharaṇīyānabhisaṅkharaṇīyavasena abhisaṅkhatābhidhānāni anabhisaṅkhatābhidhānānīti dvedhā dissanato.
anya-e0803n4:212_3: Tathā hi katthaci keci ‘‘sakyasīho’’ti abhidhānaṁ paṭicca ‘‘sakyakesarī sakyamigādhipo’’tiādinā nānāvividhamabhidhānamabhisaṅkharonti,
anya-e0803n4:212_11: taṁ jalajaṁ nāmāti mantvā paṭisambhidāppattehi ariyehi desanāvilāsavasena vutto ‘‘padumuttaranāmino’’ti
anya-e0803n4:213_1: Vuttañhetaṁ dhammasenāpatinā āyasmatā sāriputtena ‘‘buddhoti netaṁ nāmaṁ mātarā kataṁ,
anya-e0803n4:213_6: vimokkhantikametaṁ buddhānaṁ bhagavantānaṁ bodhiyā mūle saha sabbaññutaññāṇappaṭilābhā sacchikā paññatti yadidaṁ buddho’’ti,
anya-e0803n4:213_10: Na hi tāni abhidhānāni ceva ‘‘satthā sugato jino’’tiādīni ca aññaṁ kiñci abhidhānaṁ paṭicca abhisaṅkhatāni,
anya-e0803n4:213_11: nāpi aññāni abhidhānāni etāni paṭicca abhisaṅkhatāni dissanti.
anya-e0803n4:213_12: Tathā hi ‘‘buddho’’ti abhidhānaṁ paṭicca ‘‘bujjhitā bodhetā bodhako’’tiādīni nāmābhidhānāni na abhisaṅkharonti.
anya-e0803n4:213_13: Tathā ‘‘bhagavā satthā sugato’’tiādīni nāmābhidhānāni paṭicca ‘‘sampannabhago anusāsako sundaravacano’’tiādīni nāmābhidhānāni nābhisaṅkharonti.
anya-e0803n4:213_14: Evaṁ imaṁ vibhāgaṁ dassetuṁ ‘‘munindo samaṇindo samaṇissaro yatissaro ādiccabandhu ravibandhū’’tiādinā nayena punarutti amhehi katāti daṭṭhabbā.
anya-e0803n4:215_0: Dviduggamavaro buddho, iti nāmaṁ dvidhā bhave’’ti.
anya-e0803n4:216_0: Pabhūti paraṁ pasayha bhavatīti pabhū, issaro.
anya-e0803n4:216_1: ‘‘Araññassa pabhū ayaṁ luddako’’ti idametassatthassa sādhakaṁ vacanaṁ.
anya-e0803n4:216_6: Iti cattāro khandhe arūpino abhibhavīti abhibhū.
anya-e0803n4:216_7: So ca kho niccetanattā abhibhavanakriyāyāsati pubbevā’saññuppattito jhānalābhikāle attanā adhigatapañcamajjhānaṁ
anya-e0803n4:216_8: saññāvirāgavasena bhāvetvā cattāro arūpakkhandhe asaññibhave appavattikaraṇena abhibhavitumārabhi,
anya-e0803n4:216_9: tadabhibhavanakiccaṁ idāni siddhanti abhibhavīti abhibhūti vuccati.
anya-e0803n4:216_10: Apica niccetanabhāvena abhibhavanabyāpāre asatipi pubbe sacetanakāle sabyāpārattā sacetanassa viya niccetanassāpi
anya-e0803n4:216_12: Dissati hi loke sāsane ca sacetanassa viya acetanassapi upacārena sabyāpāratāvacanaṁ.
anya-e0803n4:219_1: phalesino chadanaṁ vippahāyā’’ti ca ‘‘phalaṁ toseti kassaka’’nti ca ādi.
anya-e0803n4:219_2: Abhibhūsaddassa asaññasattābhidhānatte ‘‘abhibhuṁ abhibhuto maññatī’’ti idamettha sādhakaṁ vacanaṁ.
anya-e0803n4:219_6: Vuttañhetaṁ bhagavatā ‘‘tathāgato bhikkhave abhibhū anabhibhūto aññadatthudaso vasavattī’’ti.
anya-e0803n4:219_7: Keci pana ‘‘abhibhū nāma sahasso brahmā’’ti vadanti.
anya-e0803n4:220_2: tiṇṇo lokantagū vibhū’’ti idametassatthassa sādhakaṁ vacanaṁ.
anya-e0803n4:220_3: Vibhūti hettha rūpakāyadhammakāyasampattiyā visesabhūtoti attho. Āha ca –
anya-e0803n4:225_0: Dhārento brāhmaṇaṁ vaṇṇaṁ, bhikkhāya maṁ upāgamī’’ti –
anya-e0803n4:226_3: Gotrabhūti gottasaṅkhātaṁ amatamahānibbānaṁ ārammaṇaṁ katvā bhūtoti gotrabhū,
anya-e0803n4:226_6: Yesaṁ dhammānaṁ samanantarā ariyadhammassa avakkanti hoti,
anya-e0803n4:226_12: ‘‘bhavissanti kho panānanda anāgatamaddhānaṁ gotrabhuno kāsāvakaṇṭhā dussīlā pāpadhammā’’ti idametassatthassa sādhakaṁ vacanaṁ.
anya-e0803n4:226_14: So hi mātāpitibharaṇādīhi sattahi vattehi sakkattaṁ labhitvā aññe deve vattena abhibhavatīti vatrabhū.
anya-e0803n4:226_15: Āgamaṭṭhakathāyaṁ pana bhūdhātumhi labbhamānaṁ pattiatthampi gahetvā ‘‘vattena aññe abhibhavitvā devissariyaṁ pattoti vatrabhū’’ti vuttaṁ,
anya-e0803n4:226_18: Ettha hi vatrabhūti vatranāmakassa asurassa abhibhavitā.
anya-e0803n4:226_25: Sabbābhibhūti ca idaṁ nāmaṁ tathāgatasseva yujjati.
anya-e0803n4:232_0: Idāni aniyataliṅgānaṁ niyataliṅgesu pakkhittānaṁ bhūtaparābhūta sambhūtasaddādīnaṁ niddeso vuccati.
anya-e0803n4:232_1: Tatra bhūtoti attano paccayehi abhavīti bhūto,
anya-e0803n4:232_2: bhūtoti jāto sañjāto nibbatto abhinibbatto pātubhūto,
anya-e0803n4:232_3: bhūtoti vā laddhasarūpo yo koci saviññāṇako vā aviññāṇako vā.
anya-e0803n4:232_5: bhūtoti sacco tatho avitatho aviparīto yo koci,
anya-e0803n4:232_15: ‘‘rūpe vibhūte na phusanti phassā’’ti idametassatthassa sādhakaṁ vacanaṁ.
anya-e0803n4:232_22: Yena kenaci yo pīḷito hīḷito vā,
anya-e0803n4:232_32: tathā ‘‘idha bhikkhave bhikkhu na heva anaddhabhūtaṁ attānaṁ na addhabhāvetī’’ti padampi.
anya-e0803n4:233_3: Ettha bhāvitoti iminā samānādhikaraṇaṁ ‘‘satisambojjhaṅgo kho kassapa mayā sammadakkhāto bhāvito’’tiādīsu guṇīvācakaṁ padhānapadaṁ sāsane daṭṭhabbaṁ.
anya-e0803n4:233_7: te na āsīsati na sevatīti suttapadattho.
anya-e0803n4:233_17: devadattena attano abuddhabhāvena ceva khantimettādīnañca abhāvena kumārakassapatthero ca therī ca manaṁ nāsito,
anya-e0803n4:233_18: manaṁ vuḷho ahosī’’tiādīsu cassa payogo veditabbo.
anya-e0803n4:235_0: Santaṁ tassa manaṁ hoti, manamhi upakūlitoti.
anya-e0803n4:236_2: Tabbapaccayaṭṭhāne hi sakkuṇeyyapadayojanā dissati ‘‘aladdhaṁ ārammaṇaṁ laddhabbaṁ labhanīyaṁ laddhuṁ vā sakkuṇeyya’’nti.
anya-e0803n4:236_5: Tathā hi tabbapaccayaṭṭhāne arahatipadayojanā dissati ‘‘parisakkuṇeyyaṁ lābhamarahatīti laddhabba’’nti.
anya-e0803n4:236_6: Ettha pana paribhottabboti padassa atthibhāve ‘‘khattiyo kho mahārāja daharoti na uññātabbo na paribhottabbo’’ti pāḷi nidassanaṁ.
anya-e0803n4:237_0: ‘‘Kiṁ so bhamāno saccako’’, iccatra pāḷiyaṁ pana;
anya-e0803n4:239_0: Atrāyaṁ pāḷi ‘‘kiṁ so bhamāno saccako nigaṇṭhaputto,
anya-e0803n4:239_6: sa rājavasatiṁ vase’’ti idametassatthassa sādhakaṁ vacanaṁ.
anya-e0803n4:239_11: addasa accutaṁ isi’’ntiādīni viya paripuṇṇuttarakriyāpadāni katvā rājā bhavamāno sampattimanubhavatītiādinā yojetabbāni.
anya-e0803n4:239_12: ‘‘Saramāno gacchanto’’tiādīni hi ‘‘yāto gato patto’’tiādīhi sadisāni na honti,
anya-e0803n4:240_3: tasmā ‘‘rājapurisehi nīyamāno coro evaṁ cintesī’’tiādīni viya paripuṇṇuttarakriyāpadāni katvā aññehi paribhaviyamāno tāṇaṁ gavesati.
anya-e0803n4:240_6: Ayaṁ aniyataliṅgānaṁ niyataliṅgesu pakkhittānaṁ bhūta parābhūta sambhūtasaddānaṁ niddeso.
anya-e0803n4:240_7: Iccevaṁ pulliṅgānaṁ bhūdhātumayānaṁ yathārahaṁ nibbacanādivasena niddeso vibhāvito.
anya-e0803n4:241_4: Bhāvanāti vaḍḍhanā brūhanā phātikaraṇaṁ āsevanā bahulīkāro.
anya-e0803n4:242_1: atha vā bhavanti jāyanti vaḍḍhanti cettha thāvarā ca jaṅgamā cāti bhūmi.
anya-e0803n4:242_3: ‘‘Paṭhamāya bhūmiyā pattiyā’’tiādīsu pana lokuttaramaggo bhūmīti vuccati.
anya-e0803n4:243_0: ‘‘Pathavī medanī bhūmi, bhūrī bhū puthuvī mahī;
anya-e0803n4:244_0: Chamā vasumatī ubbī, avanī ku vasundharā;
anya-e0803n4:245_0: Jagatī khiti vasudhā, dharaṇī go dharā’’iti.
anya-e0803n4:246_0: Atra bhū ku gosaddā pathavīpadatthe vattantīti kutra diṭṭhapubbāti ce?
anya-e0803n4:248_0: Bhū ku goiti pathavī, vuccatīti vibhāvaye.
anya-e0803n4:249_3: atha vā visesato bhavanti sattā etāyāti vibhūti,
anya-e0803n4:249_6: Pihanīyā vibhūtiyo’’ti ca idametassatthassa sādhakaṁ vacanaṁ.
anya-e0803n4:250_1: Sā hi bhavanti etthāti bhūrīti vuccati,
anya-e0803n4:250_2: bhavati vā paññāyati vaḍḍhati cāti bhūrī,
anya-e0803n4:250_3: atha vā bhūtābhūtā tannissitā sattā ramanti etthāti bhūrī.
anya-e0803n4:250_5: tasmā sā imināpi atthena bhūrīti vuccati.
anya-e0803n4:250_10: ayogā bhūrisaṅkhayo’’ti ettha aṭṭhakathāvacanaṁ imassatthassa sādhakaṁ.
anya-e0803n4:250_11: Atha vā bhūte atthe ramatīti bhūrī,
anya-e0803n4:250_13: ‘‘bhūrī medhā pariṇāyikā’’ti ettha aṭṭhakathāvacanaṁ imassatthassa sādhakaṁ.
anya-e0803n4:250_14: Atha vā paññāyeva rāgādayo dhamme abhibhavatīti bhūrī,
anya-e0803n4:250_16: Tathā hi paṭisambhidāmagge āyasmatā sāriputtena vuttaṁ ‘‘rāgaṁ abhibhūyatīti bhūrī, paññā.
anya-e0803n4:250_18: taṁ ariṁ maddatīti bhūrī, paññā. Doso. Moho…pe…
anya-e0803n4:250_21: Ettha pana ‘‘gotrabhū’’ti padamiva ‘‘aribhū’’ti vattabbepi bhūsaddaṁ pubbanipātaṁ katvā sandhivasena bhūrīti padamuccāritanti daṭṭhabbaṁ.
anya-e0803n4:250_22: Apica īdisesu nāmikapadesu vināpi upasaggena abhibhavanādiatthā labbhantiyeva,
anya-e0803n4:258_0: Ñāṇaṁ paññāṇamummaṅgo, sattho soto ca diṭṭhi ca;
anya-e0803n4:259_0: Mantā bodho buddhi buddhaṁ, paṭibhānañca bodhiti.
anya-e0803n4:260_0: Dhammo vijjā gati monaṁ, nepakkaṁ go matī muti;
anya-e0803n4:261_0: Vīmaṁsā yoni dhonā ca, paṇḍā paṇḍiccayampi ca;
anya-e0803n4:275_3: Bhotīti yāya saddhiṁ kathentena sā itthī ‘‘bhotī’’ iti vattabbā,
anya-e0803n4:275_4: tasmā iminā padena itthī vohariyatīti ca daṭṭhabbaṁ.
anya-e0803n4:275_5: Yathā hi purisena saddhiṁ kathentena puriso ‘‘bhavaṁ’’ iti vohariyati,
anya-e0803n4:275_6: evameva itthiyā saddhiṁ kathentena itthī ‘‘bhotī’’iti vohariyati.
anya-e0803n4:275_10: mā bhotī kupitā ahū’’ti cettha nidassanaṁ.
anya-e0803n4:275_11: Atha vā idhekacco satto itthiliṅgavasena laddhanāmo,
anya-e0803n4:275_13: tasmā iminā padena itthīpi itthiliṅgena laddhanāmā anitthīpi vohariyatīti ca daṭṭhabbā.
anya-e0803n4:275_14: Tathā hi devaputtopi ‘‘devatā’’ti itthiliṅgavasena voharitabbattā devatāsaddamapekkhitvā ‘‘bhotī’’iti voharito,
anya-e0803n4:275_17: taṁ me akkhāhi pucchitā’’ti ettha pana devatāsaddamapekkhitvā ‘‘bhotī’’iti itthi liṅgavohāro kato.
anya-e0803n4:275_18: Atrāyaṁ suttapadattho ‘‘yadi so kuhako dhanatthiko tāpaso na jānāti,
anya-e0803n4:275_19: bhotī devatā pana jānāti ki’’nti. Apica –
anya-e0803n4:277_0: Karomi te taṁ vacanaṁ, tvaṁsi ācariyo mamā’’ti –
anya-e0803n4:279_0: ‘‘Na tvaṁ bāle vijānāsi, yathā arahataṁ vaco’’ti;
anya-e0803n4:281_1: kusarājaṁ mahabbala’’nti ettha ca itthīyeva itthiliṅgavasena voharitā,
anya-e0803n4:281_2: tasmā katthaci itthipurisapadatthasaṅkhātaṁ atthaṁ anapekkhitvā liṅgamattamevāpekkhitvā bhotī devatā,
anya-e0803n4:281_6: Katthaci pana liṅgañca atthañca apekkhitvā ‘‘bhotī itthī,
anya-e0803n4:282_1: Atha vā bhavanti jāyanti vaḍḍhanti cettha sattasaṅkhārāti bhū.
anya-e0803n4:282_9: pāpakaṁ vata bhāsasī’’ti idametesamatthānaṁ sādhakaṁ vacanaṁ.
anya-e0803n4:283_0: Aniyataliṅgānaṁ pana niyatitthiliṅgesu pakkhittānaṁ bhūtaparābhūtasambhūtasaddādīnaṁ niddeso nayānusārena suviññeyyova.
anya-e0803n4:283_1: Iccevaṁ itthiliṅgānaṁ bhūdhātumayānaṁ yathārahaṁ nibbacanādivasena niddeso vibhāvito.
anya-e0803n4:284_3: bhavati vā tasmiṁ tadadhīnavuttitāya upādārūpanti bhūtaṁ.
anya-e0803n4:284_4: Atha vā bhūtanti satto bhūtanāmako vā.
anya-e0803n4:284_5: Bhūtanti hi napuṁsakavasena sakalo satto evaṁnāmako ca yakkhādiko vuccati.
anya-e0803n4:284_10: tamhā ṭhānā apakkamī’’ti evamādīsu napuṁsakappayogo veditabbo.
anya-e0803n4:284_14: na bahi ṭhānaṁ upalabbhatī’’ti cuṇṇiyapadaracanāyampi bhūtasaddassa napuṁsakaliṅgattadassanatoti avagantabbaṁ.
anya-e0803n4:284_16: Tassa mahantapātubhāvādīhi kāraṇehi mahābhūtatā veditabbā. Kathaṁ?
anya-e0803n4:288_0: Yojetabbā tiliṅge te, iti ñe yyaṁ visesato.
anya-e0803n4:290_0: Idāni bhūto, cittāni, bhūtāni vimalāni tu.
anya-e0803n4:293_1: Tañhi bhavanti vaḍḍhanti etthāti bhavittanti vuccati,
anya-e0803n4:293_3: iti paṅke avassayi’’nti idametassatthassa sādhakaṁ vacanaṁ.
anya-e0803n4:296_3: ‘‘bhūnahaccaṁ kataṁ mayā’’ti ca idametassatthassa sādhakaṁ vacanaṁ.
anya-e0803n4:297_1: Atha vā bhavanti vaḍḍhanti ettha sattā puttadhītāhi nānāsampattīhi cāti bhavanaṁ vuccati geho,
anya-e0803n4:298_0: Atthavibhāvīti atthassa vibhāvanasīlaṁ cittaṁ vā ñāṇaṁ vā kulaṁ vā atthavibhāvi.
anya-e0803n4:299_3: Apica gotrabhūti nibbānārammaṇaṁ maggavīthiyaṁ pavattaṁ gotrabhuñāṇaṁ vā saṅkhārārammaṇaṁ vā phalasamāpattivīthiyaṁ pavattaṁ gotrabhuñāṇaṁ.
anya-e0803n4:299_6: gottābhidhānā ca nibbānato ārammaṇakaraṇavasena bhavatīti ‘‘gotrabhū’’ti vuccati,
anya-e0803n4:299_7: dutiyaṁ pana saṅkhārārammaṇampi samānaṁ āsevanapaccayabhāvena sasampayuttāni phalacittāni gottābhidhāne nibbānamhi bhāvetīti ‘‘gotrabhū’’ti vuccati.
anya-e0803n4:304_0: Dīghabhāvena vuttaṁ tu, napuṁsakanti no vade;
anya-e0803n4:305_0: Binduvantī’tare bhedā, tayo iti hi bhāsitā.
anya-e0803n4:306_0: Īkārantā ca ūdantā, rassattaṁ yanti sāsane;
anya-e0803n4:308_1: cittena saha na bhavatīti nacittasahabhu, rūpaṁ.
anya-e0803n4:309_0: Aniyataliṅgānaṁ niyatanapuṁsakaliṅgesu pakkhittānaṁ bhūtaparābhūtasaddādīnaṁ niddeso nayānusārena suviññeyyova.
anya-e0803n4:309_1: Iccevaṁ napuṁsakaliṅgānaṁ bhūdhātumayānaṁ yathārahaṁ nibbacanādivasena niddeso vibhāvito.
anya-e0803n4:314_0: Iti navaṅge sāṭṭhakathe piṭakattaye byappathagatīsu viññūnaṁ
